question: Name of Indian American who has been chosen for the 2017 NASA Astronaut Candidate Class is?
explanation: Indian-American Raja Chari, a Lieutenant Colonel with the US Air Force, has been chosen for the 2017 NASA Astronaut Candidate Class. He is among 12 new astronauts. NASA selected seven men and five women who will comprise the 22nd class of American spaceflight trainees since 1959.
